ix.iface.util
Class GridColumn

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ix.iface.util.GridColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GridColumn
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A class that can be used to consruct a column of a tabular display in which different columns have different widths. To make entries align across rows, all columns must be made the same height by placing them in something like a horizontal Box.

See Also:
Serialized Form
